otherNames: God of War Alliance, War God Alliance, 战神联盟
synopsis: The Blue Star Continent suffered a magnetic storm, which led to a dramatic change in the environment and the revival of spiritual energy. Under the nourishment of the spiritual energy of heaven and earth, the various body functions of humans and animals were infinitely stimulated. After a long period of baptism, a tense situation of long-term confrontation between spiritual beasts and humans for living space was formed. In order to protect their homes, humans continue to develop science and technology and new cultivation systems, establish combat alliances, and vigorously cultivate combat talents. The young Ling Tian is a leader among the younger generation of the junior school Qionghai War School. He has a rare ancient god bloodline and a mysterious treasure “God’s Brain”. One day, Ling Tian learned from his assistant Yan Ling from the future that in three years, the continent will face a major disaster, and he will also die heroically in this disaster. Since then, for the future of mankind, Ling Tian has followed Yan Ling’s advice and is determined to cultivate to the peak state within three years and change everything.
